title: A Cargo Ship With 4,000 Luxury Cars Is on Fire, Adrift in Atlantic Ocean
sub_head: Insurers estimated cargo worth $100 million; Porsche confirms 1,100 vehicles onboard
body:
A cargo ship carrying thousands of luxury cars is adrift and on fire in the Atlantic Ocean after the vessel’s crew were evacuated.
The 650-feet-long Felicity Ace caught fire near Portugal’s Azores Islands on Wednesday, with 22 on board, the Portuguese Navy said in a statement. All crew members were airlifted to safety and taken to the nearby island of Faial.
